divs: Sighting DetailsOutside smoking cigarette, noticed bright star like object approaching from S.S.E., very high, no sound, no strobes, turned right to E.N.E, same brightness, turned into red-orange dot , then out of sight, long before reaching horizon.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hillsboro
There were no other sightings in Hillsboro on or around January 15th 2009
